invite.subject: You're Invited! - Speed Contractor
invite.text:
You have been invited to join the Speed Contractor Beta.

Please click on the following link, or paste this into your browser to register:

https://www.speedcontractor.com/register/<invite-token>

confirmEmail.subject: Please confirm your email (user.email) - Speed Contractor
confirmEmail.text:
You are receiving this because you have signed up for an account with Speed Contractor.

Please click on the following link, or paste this into your browser to confirm your email address:

https://www.speedcontractor.com/confirm/<email-confirm-token>

If you did not sign up for Speed Contractor, please ignore this email.

signup.subject: Please confirm your email (<user-email>) - Speed Contractor
signup.text:
You are receiving this because you have signed up for an account with Speed Contractor.

Please click on the following link, or paste this into your browser to confirm your email address:

https://www.speedcontractor.com/confirm/<token>

If you did not sign up for Speed Contractor, please ignore this email.

confirmComplete.subject: Welcome to Speed Contractor
confirmComplete.text:
Hello,

Welcome to Speed Contractor, you can login to your account at the link below to get started.

https://www.speedcontractor.com/login

forgotPassword.subject: Password Reset - Speed Contractor
forgotPassword.text:
You are receiving this because you (or someone else) have requested the reset of the password for your account.

Please click on the following link, or paste this into your browser to complete the process:

https://www.speedcontractor.com/reset/<token>

If you did not request this, please ignore this email and your password will remain unchanged.

passwordReset.subject: Your password has been changed - Speed Contractor
passwordReset.text:
Hello,

This is a confirmation that the password for your account <user.email> has just been changed.

businessApproved.subject: Business Request Approved - Speed Contractor
businessApproved.text:
Hello,

This is a confirmation that your business account (<company-name>) has just been approved.
